name: Centaur Labs
headline: Labeling medical data at scale

founders.name: Tom Gellatly, Founder
founders.description: Hello! I live in Durham, NC. I have a background in mobile and web development and engineering management. I studied CSE at the University of Michigan. I was the first employee at SF ride-sharing startup Sidecar, which was acquired by General Motors in 2016. I then managed the mapping & data labeling engineering teams at Cruise Automation for 1.5 years.

founders.name: Zach Rausnitz, Founder
founders.description: I'm a self-taught, generalist software engineer. I cofounded Centaur Labs in 2017. Previously I worked as a full-stack software engineer at Washington City Paper, where many notable people in media got their start.

## The only solution for scale and skill
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/668d6e84ce3b78c1f405ea92_Frame%205288.svg)
#### Scale data annotation exponentially
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6695900961c9b4ccce6822b7_Labeling%20Rate.svg)
Stop annotating data slowly with in-house teams or outsourcing to teams whose quality you can't control.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Access the Centaur Labs network of thousands of medical doctors, professionals, researchers and students for skilled annotation
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Embed data annotation seamlessly into your data pipeline with end to end API integration
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
View labeler-level insights to give you confidence in the Centaur Labs network


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6695900961c9b4ccce6822b7_Labeling%20Rate.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6695902a50464f6f55fc2299_Confusion%20Matrix.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/668d6e847844081755b26d4b_Frame%205291.svg)
#### Take control of annotation quality
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6695902a50464f6f55fc2299_Confusion%20Matrix.svg)
You define quality. We rigorously measure and manage it.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Measure labeler performance. Only include opinions from labelers whose quality score meets your expectations
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Incentivize labeler performance with small batch, mobile-first competitions. Labelers are only paid for performance and give 100% of their effort on every case
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Generate multiple reads on each case, and even more on ambiguous cases


![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/668d6e84a1e3cdb2000eb421_Frame%205290.svg)
#### Master your dataset
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/66959054135af85f31042285_Precision.svg)
Proactively understand the nuances of your dataset, so your data works with you, not against you.
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Access meaningful statistical information about your dataset
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Leverage case-level insights to inform model development e.g. precision-recall curves, label distribution, labeler agreement
  * ![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5f6cd8828a0cf111582bec45/6612b95f47d52bfcfeb00052_Check%20icon.svg)
Identify edge cases and challenges with data quality based on flagged cases and labeler comments

**Centaur Labs: Empowering Medical Data Annotation**

Founded in 2017 and based in Boston, Centaur Labs operates at the intersection of healthcare and artificial intelligence. As part of Y Combinator's Winter 2019 batch, this innovative company is on a mission to label medical data at scale—ensuring that AI systems can learn from high-quality, accurately annotated datasets.

### What They Do
Centaur Labs specializes in crowdsourcing data labeling for various types of medical data, including text, images, audio, video, and waveform data. Their unique approach combines human expertise—sourcing insights from a network of medical professionals—with automated quality checks. The result? Faster, more accurate data annotations to accelerate AI development in healthcare and life sciences.

### Recent Developments
Just recently, they raised over $16 million in Series B funding, which will help them further expand their capabilities. This significant investment reflects growing confidence in their model and the increasing demand for efficient data annotation in the healthcare sector.

### Team and Operations
With a dedicated team of about 25 employees, Centaur Labs is nimble yet impactful. They cater to a diverse array of industries, from medical devices to consumer applications and insurance. Their platform provides users seamless integration into existing data pipelines, ensuring that data annotation is both scalable and reliable.

### Customer Success
Centaur Labs champions collaboration. They empower customers—from startups to established enterprises—by providing high-quality labels at an unprecedented scale, often resulting in enhanced outcomes for machine learning models. Customers frequently cite improvements in model performance thanks to the comprehensive data labeling services offered.
